props.name: autoCreate
props.desc: A DomHelper element spec used to autocreate the layout (defaults to {tag: 'div', cls: 'x-form-ct'})

props.name: clear
props.desc: True to add a clearing element at the end of this layout, equivalent to CSS clear: both (defaults to true)

props.name: hideLabels
props.desc: True to suppress the display of field labels in this layout (defaults to false)

props.name: labelSeparator
props.desc: The separator to use after field labels (defaults to ':')

props.name: labelWidth
props.desc: Fixed width in pixels of all field labels (defaults to undefined)

props.name: style
props.desc:
A style specification string, e.g. "width:100px", or object in the form {width:"100px"}, or
a function which returns such a specification.
